=Module <<a_api_type | module Ocsigen_comet.Security >> =
<<div class="code"|<<span class="keyword"|module>> Security: <<span class='code'|sig>><<a_api text=".." | module Ocsigen_comet.Security >><<span class='code'|end>>>>
----
<<div id="VALset_timeout" class="code"|<<span class="keyword"|val>> set~_timeout : <<span class="code type"|?reset:bool -> float -> unit>>>><<div class="info"|<<span class='code'|set~_timeout ~?reset f>> sets the timeout value for future ~Comet connections
      to <<span class='code'|f>>~. ~If <<span class='code'|reset>> is <<span class='code'|true>> then current connections are closed and the
      new timeout value will apply to the reopened connections~. ~Default value
      for <<span class='code'|reset>> is false~.\\
>>
<<div id="VALdeactivate" class="code"|<<span class="keyword"|val>> deactivate : <<span class="code type"|unit -> unit>>>><<div class="info"|<<span class='code'|deactivate ~(~)>> ceases all ~Comet related activity~. ~Each opened connection
      is closed~. ~Further attempts to connect to the server with a ~Comet specific
      content type will result in a ~H~T~T~P status code ~5~0~3 ~(~Unavailable~)~.
      ~If called when ~Comet is not activated it does nothing ~(not even logging
      the deactivation attempt~.\\
>>
<<div id="VALactivate" class="code"|<<span class="keyword"|val>> activate : <<span class="code type"|unit -> unit>>>><<div class="info"|<<span class='code'|activate ~(~)>> starts serving ~Comet requests~. ~It is the client~'s own
      responsibility to reopen a connection~. ~If ~Comet was already activated it
      keeps going and nothing happens~.\\
>>
<<div id="VALactivated" class="code"|<<span class="keyword"|val>> activated : <<span class="code type"|unit -> bool>>>><<div class="info"|<<span class='code'|activated ~(~)>> reflects the activation state of the ~Comet
      module~. ~If <<span class='code'|false>> it indicates that ~Comet connections are answered with a
      ~H~T~T~P status code ~5~0~3~. ~If <<span class='code'|true>> it indicates that ~Comet connections are
      handled in a standard fashion by the server~.\\
>>
